reviewtext: Lens functions OK, no issues there.  What is disturbing is its ability to clearly focus.  All my distance shots are "fuzzy"  As a test, I took a shot at mid range or 150 mm and magnified it with standard photo editing software.  All the detail was fuzzy.  I took another lens and performed the same test and the magnified image was sharp.  I now have a rather pricey paper weight.
